paragraph.heading: 2Include path
paragraph.paragraph:
This is where you can enter the location of the directories where the C/C++ compiler will look for the header files that are required. The header files which the C/C++ compiler will look for are the ones that appear in an encapsulation of a C/C++ external in an Eiffel class. Click
../30_compiler/30_external_features/00_introduction.xml here to have more information about C/C++ externals specification.
paragraph.heading: 2Object file
paragraph.paragraph: When you use an external C/C++ library what you have is header files and library files. We have seen how to include the header files, in this part you can select the inclusion of the library files.
